text: The 2016–17 season was R&F;'s first season in the top-tier division in Hong Kong football. R&F; competed in the Premier League, Senior Challenge Shield, FA Cup and Sapling Cup in this season. On 1 August 2016, R&F; (Hong Kong) was accepted to play in the Hong Kong Premier League with following conditions: (1) Signing at least eight Hong Kong players. (2) Using at least three Hong Kong players in a match. (3) Non-Chinese/Hong Kong player could not be registered in the club. (4) Sponsoring a cup competition with a fee of $1 million. The club finished their inaugural season in 10th place with 3 wins, 1 draw and 16 defeats in the 2016–17 Hong Kong Premier League, which secured to stay in the top flight for the next season.
